sentences.english: The aim of this article is to study the jade design thought in Kaogongji.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究《考工記》玉器設計思想。

sentences.english: According to Artificers' Record, there seems to have been planning system of imperial palace before Qin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《考工記》表明先秦宮城規劃形成了制度。

sentences.english: Three, the design esthetics thought of jade in Kaogongji.
